### Before Tuesday

- Make sure piloting is complete. Bring questions to class! 

### Before Thursday

We will return to statistical inference. Please complete the following BEFORE class:

- [Hypothesis Testing](https://statsthinking21.github.io/statsthinking21-core-site/hypothesis-testing.html) (Ch.9 in Statistical Thinking for the 21st Century by Russ Poldrack)

- [Practical Statistical Modeling](https://statsthinking21.github.io/statsthinking21-core-site/practical-example.html) (Ch.17 in Statistical Thinking for the 21st Century by Russ Poldrack)

- Review [tidyverse](https://malooflab.ucdavis.edu/apps/tidyverse-tutorial/) via this tutorial!

### After Thursday

Lots to do in these weeks before break! 

- Work on Formative Milestone #3 (R Inferential)
- Finalize pre-registration for Project Milestone #5
- Resubmit Formative Milestone #2 (R Descriptive)
- Submit initial analyses for Project Milestone #6
